name: Rhinoceros Game
description:
Description

Created for a computer science midterm project that is based off of the Google Dinosaur Game. You play as a rhinoceros dodging shoebill birds and 'dracaena marginata'.

How to Play

- Space to jump/skip screens

- Escape to exit

- Up/Down Arrows to change speed

- R to reset speed

Music

https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/8bit-music-for-game-68698/
